# errors

**Instance Property**

A list of custom errors to display on the payment sheet.

## Declaration

```swift
sequence <ApplePayError> errors;
```

## Discussion

List the errors on the payment sheet for the user to remedy. If there are multiple errors, list the most important error first.

For information on errors, see [doc://com.apple.applepayontheweb/documentation/ApplePayontheWeb/ApplePayError].

## Updating shipping contact properties

- **newLineItems**: An optional list of updated line items.
- **newShippingMethods**: A list of shipping methods that are available to the updated shipping contact.
- **newTotal**: The new total that results from a change in the shipping contact.
